name: Openvas
longDescription: OpenVAS is a full-featured vulnerability scanner. Its capabilities include unauthenticated and authenticated testing, various high-level and low-level internet and industrial protocols, performance tuning for large-scale scans and a powerful internal programming language to implement any type of vulnerability test
description: OpenVAS is the scanner component of Greenbone Vulnerability Management, a software framework of several services and tools offering vulnerability scanning and vulnerability management.
